_sText:
You dont need to take these full thing in your map you just need to take out the player_speedmod entity and the trigger brush

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Trigger will make you 3times faster but you can change it to half-speed or 10times faster , you just need to change the output:

(...)with a parameter override of: 0.001 - 999 (I think^^)

actually its 3 (= 3times faster) 1means normal speed 0.5 means half speed , 2means double speed

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You dont need to C&P the player_speedmod every time , you just need to copy it 1time

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can make that the player just get speed in a specific area by adding these output:

My output named:              On End Touch

Target entities named:        Player_speedmod

Via this Input:               modifySpeed

with a parameter override of: 1

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you need help just ask me!
